averycowan.checkers

Class CheckersWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.world.World<Actor>
      • info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld
        • averycowan.checkers.CheckersWorld

  • public class CheckersWorld
extends ActorWorld
    This class stands between the Grid and the GUI as well as holds the AI.
